verses.verse: And it came <WH1961> about in the eleventh <WH259> <WH6240> year, <WH8141> in the third <WH7992> [month, <WH2320>] on the first <WH259> of the month, that the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me saying, <WH559>
"Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> say <WH559> to Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and to his multitude, <WH1995> 'Whom <WH413> <WH4310> are you like <WH1819> in your greatness <WH1433>?

'Behold, <WH2009> Assyria <WH804> [was] a cedar <WH730> in Lebanon <WH3844> With beautiful <WH3303> branches <WH6057> and forest <WH2793> shade, <WH6751> And very <WH6967> high; <WH6967> And its top <WH6788> was among <WH996> the clouds. <WH5645>

'The waters <WH4325> made it grow, <WH1431> the deep <WH8415> made <WH7311> it high. <WH7311> With its rivers <WH5104> it continually extended <WH1980> all <WH5439> around <WH5439> its planting <WH4302> place, <WH4302> And it sent <WH7971> out its channels <WH8585> to all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the field. <WH7704>

'Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> its height <WH6967> was loftier <WH1361> than <WH4480> all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> And its boughs <WH5634> became <WH7235> many <WH7235> and its branches <WH6288> long <WH748> Because <WH4480> of many <WH7227> waters <WH4325> as it spread <WH7971> them out.

'All <WH3605> the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064> nested <WH7077> in its boughs, <WH5589> And under <WH8478> its branches <WH6288> all <WH3605> the beasts <WH9130> of the field <WH7704> gave <WH3205> birth, <WH3205> And all <WH3605> great <WH7227> nations <WH1471> lived <WH3427> under its shade. <WH6738>
'So it was beautiful <WH3302> in its greatness, <WH1433> in the length <WH753> of its branches; <WH1808> For its roots <WH8328> extended <WH1961> to many <WH7227> waters. <WH4325>

'The cedars <WH730> in God's garden <WH1588> could not match <WH6004> it; The cypresses <WH1265> could not compare <WH1819> with its boughs, <WH5589> And the plane <WH6196> trees <WH6196> could not match its branches. <WH6288> No <WH3605> <WH3808> tree <WH6086> in God's garden <WH1588> could compare <WH1819> with it in its beauty. <WH3308>

'I made <WH6213> it beautiful <WH3303> with the multitude <WH7230> of its branches, <WH1808> And all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of Eden, <WH5731> which <WH834> were in the garden <WH1588> of God, <WH430> were jealous <WH7065> of it.

'Therefore, <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "Because <WH3282> <WH834> it is high <WH1361> in stature, <WH6967> and it has set <WH5414> its top <WH6788> among <WH996> the clouds, <WH5645> and its heart <WH3824> is haughty <WH7311> in its loftiness, <WH1363>

therefore, I will give <WH5414> it into the hand <WH3027> of a despot <WH9012> of the nations; <WH1471> he will thoroughly <WH6213> deal <WH6213> with it. According to its wickedness <WH7562> I have driven <WH1644> it away. <WH1644>

"And alien <WH2114> tyrants <WH6184> of the nations <WH1471> have cut <WH3772> it down <WH3772> and left <WH5203> it; on the mountains <WH2022> and in all <WH3605> the valleys <WH1516> its branches <WH1808> have fallen, <WH5307> and its boughs <WH6288> have been broken <WH7665> in all <WH3605> the ravines <WH650> of the land. <WH776> And all <WH3605> the peoples <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> have gone <WH3381> down <WH3381> from its shade <WH6738> and left <WH5203> it.
"On its ruin <WH4658> all <WH3605> the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064> will dwell. <WH7931> And all <WH3605> the beasts <WH9130> of the field <WH7704> will be on its [fallen] branches <WH6288>

in order <WH4616> that all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> by the waters <WH4325> may not be exalted <WH1361> in their stature, <WH6967> nor <WH3808> set <WH5414> their top <WH6788> among <WH996> the clouds, <WH5645> nor <WH3808> their well-watered mighty <WH9012> ones stand <WH5975> [erect] in their height. <WH6967> For they have all <WH3605> been given <WH5414> over to death, <WH4194> to the earth <WH776> beneath, <WH8482> among <WH8432> the sons <WH1121> of men, <WH120> with those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953> "

'Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "On the day <WH3117> when it went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Sheol <WH7585> I caused <WH56> lamentations; <WH56> I closed <WH3680> the deep <WH8415> over <WH5921> it and held <WH4513> back <WH4513> its rivers. <WH5104> And [its] many <WH7227> waters <WH4325> were stopped <WH3607> up, and I made Lebanon <WH3844> mourn <WH6937> for it, and all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> wilted <WH5968> away <WH5968> on account <WH5921> of it.

"I made the nations <WH1471> quake <WH7493> at the sound <WH6963> of its fall <WH4658> when I made it go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to Sheol <WH7585> with those who go <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the pit; <WH953> and all <WH3605> the well-watered trees <WH6086> of Eden, <WH5731> the choicest <WH4005> and best <WH2896> of Lebanon, <WH3844> were comforted <WH5162> in the earth <WH776> beneath. <WH8482>

"They also <WH1571> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> with it to Sheol <WH7585> to those who were slain <WH2491> by the sword; <WH2719> and those who were its strength <WH2220> lived <WH3427> under its shade <WH6738> among <WH8432> the nations. <WH1471>

"To which <WH4310> among the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731> are you thus <WH3602> equal <WH1819> in glory <WH9202> and greatness <WH1433>? Yet you will be brought <WH3381> down <WH3381> with the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731> to the earth <WH776> beneath; <WH8482> you will lie <WH7901> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised, <WH6189> with those who were slain <WH2491> by the sword. <WH2719> So is Pharaoh <WH6547> and all <WH3605> his multitude! <WH1995> '"declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068> "
